mapper.sql: id, workItem_id, straight, `linear`, soldering, linear_welding, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag
mapper.select: select substring_index(substring_index(a.process,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1) from t_workitem_relation a join mysql.help_topic b on b.help_topic_id <(length(a.process) - length(replace(a.process,',',''))+1) WHERE a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_workitem (id, workItem_id, straight, `linear`, soldering, linear_welding, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag)
(select null, #{item}, 0, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0 from dual where not exists (select * from t_workitem where workItem_id = #{item}))
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_workitem t SET straight = 1, t.updater = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND workItem_id IN
#{item}

UPDATE t_workitem t SET `linear` = 1, t.updater = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND workItem_id IN
#{item}

UPDATE t_workitem t SET soldering = 1, t.updater = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND workItem_id IN
#{item}

UPDATE t_workitem t SET linear_welding = 1, t.updater = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND workItem_id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert: insert into t_workitem (id, workItem_id, straight, linear, soldering, linear_welding, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workitemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{straight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{soldering,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linearWelding,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

workItem_id = #{workitemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
straight = #{straight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
linear = #{linear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
soldering = #{soldering,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
